summary: Adds a new weapon called \"Pink Daedric Sword\"
descriptionHtml:
A sword that goes with my Pink Daedric Armor that you can find on my profile. This sword does not replace the daedric sword in-game. You can smith it at a forge. It requires the same as the daedric sword. (1 daedra heart, 1 leather strip, 2 ebony ingots)

You can also open the console (~) and type: help \"Pink Daedric Sword\" 4
This will show you the item code so you can add it to your inventory by typing: player.additem (item code) (amount)

Installation: Just move the files to your data folder and make sure to activate the .esp!!!

Thank you for downloading ^_^
author: puppyhugger
